.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyTranslator extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub PropertyTranslator(host As Object, propertyName As String, value As Object)
public delegate void PropertyTranslator(System::Object ^ host, System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ value);
type PropertyTranslator = delegate of obj * string * obj -> unit

Docs.param: 正在映射其属性的宿主控件。 宿主控件为 或 。
Docs.summary: 为宿主控件的映射属性提供转换功能。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator>委托由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>类，以实现之间的属性映射[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。
